pull.title: Call CHECK_NONFATAL only once where needed
pull.body: Now that `CHECK_NONFATAL` is the identity function starting with commit b1c5991eebb916755be188f355ad36fe01a3f529, it can be called less often in places where it was called more than once on the same value.
